plot: Operating the zamboni-machine at hockey games isn't just a job for Stein Erik, it's his passion. This documentary follows some of the ups and downs in the life of this Zamboni-operator.
title: Zamboni
plot_es: Operating the zamboni-machine at hockey games isn't just a job for Stein Erik, it's his passion. This documentary follows some of the ups and downs in the life of this Zamboni-operator.
plot_en: Operating the zamboni-machine at hockey games isn't just a job for Stein Erik, it's his passion. This documentary follows some of the ups and downs in the life of this Zamboni-operator.
